name: Samosa
description: A popular Indian snack consisting of a fried pastry filled with spiced potatoes, peas, and sometimes meat.

name: Egg Benedict
description: A classic breakfast dish consisting of an English muffin topped with poached eggs, ham or bacon, and hollandaise sauce.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A hearty Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, minced meat sauce, tomatoes, onions, garlic, and herbs.

name: Guacamole
description: A creamy dip made from mashed avocados, onions, tomatoes, lime juice, and seasonings, often served with tortilla chips.

name: Tiramisu
description: An elegant Italian dessert consisting of layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, cocoa powder, and sometimes liqueur.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A refreshing salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and a tangy Caesar dressing.

name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy stacks of griddled batter cakes served with butter and maple syrup, often enjoyed as a breakfast treat.

name: Sushi
description: A Japanese dish consisting of vinegared rice combined with various ingredients such as raw fish, seafood, and vegetables.

name: Hummus
description: A creamy dip made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil, often served with pita bread or vegetables.

name: Cheesecake
description: A decadent dessert consisting of a sweetened cream cheese filling on a graham cracker crust, often topped with fruit or sauce.

name: Burger
description: A sandwich consisting of a grilled or fried patty of ground meat (usually beef) served on a bun, often with toppings such as lettuce, tomato, onion, and condiments.

name: Avocado Toast
description: A popular breakfast dish consisting of mashed avocado spread on toasted bread, often topped with salt, pepper, and various toppings.

name: Steak
description: A tender cut of beef, grilled or pan-seared to perfection, often served with a side of vegetables and potatoes.

name: Popcorn
description: A light and crunchy snack made from dried kernels of corn, typically popped by heating and often flavored with butter, cheese, or caramel.

name: Ice Cream Sundae
description: A classic dessert consisting of scoops of ice cream topped with syrup, whipped cream, nuts, and a cherry.
